H0.text: It goes into the air as the puddle of water on a concrete driveway disappears after a few hours during a sunny day.

H1.text: Animals drink it from the puddle of water on a concrete driveway that disappears after a few hours during a sunny day.

H2.text: It soaks into the concrete, where the water from a puddle on a concrete driveway disappears after a few hours during a sunny day.

H3.text: It becomes a different substance as a puddle of water on a concrete driveway disappears after a few hours on a sunny day.

A4.text: When a molecule near the surface absorbs enough energy to overcome the vapor pressure, it will escape and enter the surrounding air as a gas.
